overview:
Jordi was a founding partner of Cluster Consulting in 1993, and in 2000 became VP of DiamondCluster International for South Europe and member of the worldwide Operating Committee.

Before 1993, Jordi worked as a telecoms consultant both for Gemini Consulting and the Monitor Company.

Jordi’s industry specialization lies in telecommunications and, more specifically, in wireless network infrastructure providers. He has been providing advise to telecoms companies for 15 years.

Jordi currently serves on the investment Committee of Spinnaker, a VC fund that specializes in the media sector.

Jordi is a member of the Bord of Directors of the The Node Company and Mobile Aware (portfolio companies).
